item.title: Re: Mystic
item.content:encoded:
No worries no worries, I mostly only check the discussion pages once or twice a month if Im not actively part of anything, so I get it completely

We're pretty close to finishing, weve been doing alot of our discussion in this forum thread. At the moment, we've basically just got to add the discipline pages.

If you want to help out with those that would be great (:

item.title: Re: Mystic
item.content:encoded:
Oh! Thank you, sorry for not responding sooner.
Is there anything I can help with?

item.title: Re: Mystic
item.content:encoded:
I believe I have completed the main page for mystic, however, its subclass pages need to be made, and something akin to the warlock invocation page needs to be made for the talents and a spell list or warlock invocation like page needs to be made for the disciplines.

I will work on the subclasses first.

item.title: Re: Mystic
item.content:encoded: Update. I have begun progress on the page.

item.title: Re: Mystic
item.content:encoded:
Sure, id be willing to help out create a page / subpages for the mystic, just for it to be listed under the archived UA section.

Of course, we'd have to make all the pages first for the mystic before it'd appear on the frontpage as usual, but the mystic link is currently leading to an empty page

item.title: Mystic
item.content:encoded:
Hey, will the Mystic class material be uploaded to this website, since other outdated/archived UA resources are also being kept on the site (Like old versions of feats, races, and the Rune Scribe prestige class)?
I know the class has a lot of contention behind it, but I figure if the management of this site is keeping other outdated materials Mystic's materials should also be here.
If required, I could attempt to help out on that front, but I am very unfamiliar with how I would go about doing so on this website.
